text: Anthony Jordan Martial (born 5 December 1995) is a French football player who plays for Manchester United FC and the French national team. Martial started playing football at Les Ulis. He moved to Lyon to start playing professionally. He moved to AS Monaco in 2013, and then to Manchester United in 2015. ==References== Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from ÃŽle-de-France Category:People from Essonne
title: Anthony Martial
